title: Potočani, Bosnia and Herzegovina
text:
Potočani is a <a href="village">village</a> in the <a href="Municipalities%20of%20Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina">municipalities</a> of <a href="Od%C5%BEak">Odžak</a> (Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina) and <a href="Vukosavlje">Vukosavlje</a> (Republika Srpska), <a href="Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina">Bosnia and Herzegovina</a>.
Demographics.
According to the 2013 census, its population was 1,520, with 1,332 living in the Odžak part and 188 in the Vukosavlje part.
